column4: hi, how do i switch from xubuntu to gnome with having to reinstall with cd?
thats it, i dont have to uninstall xfce
to install gnome and remove "xubuntu" i just write in ---->   aptitude install ubuntu-desktop  ?
bobby123, you will need to manually remove any dependencies installed by xubuntu-desktop that are not needed anymore
how do i remove the x desktop
xubuntu-desktop is a meta-package, which means it is a pseudo package that depends on al the packages required to run an xfce desktop
